orig_skill_descript: Developed capacities that facilitate learning or the more rapid acquisition of knowledge.
new_skill_descript: Skills to help with or speed up learning.

orig_skill_descript: Understanding the implications of new information for both current and future problem-solving and decision-making.
new_skill_descript: Learn new facts. Understand how they affect both current and future problems and choices.

orig_skill_descript: Giving full attention to what other people are saying, taking time to understand the points being made, asking questions as appropriate, and not interrupting at inappropriate times.
new_skill_descript: Listen closely to other people. Pay full attention to what they say. Take time to understand their meaning. Ask questions, if needed. Let people finish talking before you speak.

orig_skill_descript: Using logic and reasoning to identify the strengths and weaknesses of alternative solutions, conclusions or approaches to problems.
new_skill_descript: Use logic and reason to think through problems. Figure out the pros and cons of plans. Think of new ways to do something. Find problems and solve them.

orig_skill_descript: Selecting and using training/instructional methods and procedures appropriate for the situation when learning or teaching new things.
new_skill_descript: Use or make teaching and training plans. Match learning styles with the right plans.

orig_skill_descript: Using mathematics to solve problems.
new_skill_descript: Use math to solve problems.

orig_skill_descript: Monitoring/Assessing performance of yourself, other individuals, or organizations to make improvements or take corrective action.
new_skill_descript: Study the work process. Find problems and fix them.

orig_skill_descript: Understanding written sentences and paragraphs in work related documents.
new_skill_descript: Read and understand written text as needed for work.

orig_skill_descript: Using scientific rules and methods to solve problems.
new_skill_descript: Use the rules and methods of science to solve problems.

orig_skill_descript: Talking to others to convey information effectively.
new_skill_descript: Talk to others. Speak clearly and explain things well.

orig_skill_descript: Communicating effectively in writing as appropriate for the needs of the audience.
new_skill_descript: Write clearly and explain things well. Write in a way that meets readers’ needs.

orig_skill_descript: Developed capacities used to solve novel, ill-defined problems in complex, real-world settings.
new_skill_descript: Skills used to solve new, confusing problems in the real world.

orig_skill_descript: Identifying complex problems and reviewing related information to develop and evaluate options and implement solutions.
new_skill_descript: Find hard problems that need to be solved. Study facts and info about those problems. Find and use ways to solve the problems.

orig_skill_descript: Developed capacities used to allocate resources efficiently.
new_skill_descript: Skills used to manage people, money, and things.

orig_skill_descript: Determining how money will be spent to get the work done, and accounting for these expenditures.
new_skill_descript: Control how money is spent to get work done. Keep track of spending and keep records.

orig_skill_descript: Obtaining and seeing to the appropriate use of equipment, facilities, and materials needed to do certain work.
new_skill_descript: Order and manage equipment, space, and supplies needed to get work done. Make sure they are used the right way.

orig_skill_descript: Motivating, developing, and directing people as they work, identifying the best people for the job.
new_skill_descript: Give workers tasks to do. Get them excited to do their job. Help them gain the skills they need. Find the best workers for the job.

orig_skill_descript: Managing one's own time and the time of others.
new_skill_descript: Make sure time is spent wisely. Manage work time for self and others.

orig_skill_descript: Developed capacities used to work with people to achieve goals.
new_skill_descript: Skills used to work with others to reach goals.

orig_skill_descript: Adjusting actions in relation to others' actions.
new_skill_descript: Make sure your actions match up well with the actions of other team members. Adjust as needed.

orig_skill_descript: Teaching others how to do something.
new_skill_descript: Teach others how to do things.

orig_skill_descript: Bringing others together and trying to reconcile differences.
new_skill_descript: Bring people together to reach the best deal. Solve problems and differences.

orig_skill_descript: Persuading others to change their minds or behavior.
new_skill_descript: Change how people think and act. Get people to do what you want.

orig_skill_descript: Actively looking for ways to help people.
new_skill_descript: Look for ways to help people.

orig_skill_descript: Being aware of others' reactions and understanding why they react as they do.
new_skill_descript: Be aware of how people react. Understand why they react that way. Understand their feelings.

orig_skill_descript: Developed capacities used to understand, monitor, and improve socio-technical systems.
new_skill_descript: Skills used to understand and improve how social and technical systems work.

orig_skill_descript: Considering the relative costs and benefits of potential actions to choose the most appropriate one.
new_skill_descript: Understand the pros and cons of different actions. Choose the best action to take.

orig_skill_descript: Determining how a system should work and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect outcomes.
new_skill_descript: Understand how a system works. Figure out how changes to the system will affect outcomes.

orig_skill_descript: Identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system.
new_skill_descript: Understand the goals of a system. Find ways to measure if the system is reaching those goals. Find ways to improve or fix how the system performs.

orig_skill_descript: Developed capacities used to design, set-up, operate, and correct malfunctions involving application of machines or technological systems.
new_skill_descript: Skills used to make, set up, use, and fix machines or technology.

orig_skill_descript: Performing routine maintenance on equipment and determining when and what kind of maintenance is needed.
new_skill_descript: Keep equipment, machines, and tools in good working order. Figure out when and how they need to be fixed.

orig_skill_descript: Determining the kind of tools and equipment needed to do a job.
new_skill_descript: Choose the right kind of tools and equipment to do a job.

orig_skill_descript: Installing equipment, machines, wiring, or programs to meet specifications.
new_skill_descript: Put in and set up machines, wiring, or programs. Follow steps to set up correctly.

orig_skill_descript: Controlling operations of equipment or systems.
new_skill_descript: Use and control machines or systems.

orig_skill_descript: Watching gauges, dials, or other indicators to make sure a machine is working properly.
new_skill_descript: Make sure machines are working correctly. Check dials and other settings.

orig_skill_descript: Analyzing needs and product requirements to create a design.
new_skill_descript: Figure out what is needed to make a design or product.

orig_skill_descript: Writing computer programs for various purposes.
new_skill_descript: Write programs for computers.

orig_skill_descript: Conducting tests and inspections of products, services, or processes to evaluate quality or performance.
new_skill_descript: Test whether products are made well and made correctly.

orig_skill_descript: Repairing machines or systems using the needed tools.
new_skill_descript: Fix machines or systems. Use tools to make repairs.

orig_skill_descript: Generating or adapting equipment and technology to serve user needs.
new_skill_descript: Make or change equipment and technology to meet the needs of users.

orig_skill_descript: Determining causes of operating errors and deciding what to do about it.
new_skill_descript: Figure out the causes of operating errors. Choose how to fix them.
